programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o event_named.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1 - an oscillator with a high note. instr 1 ; Create a trigger and set its initial value to 1. ktrigger init 1
; If the trigger is equal to 0, continue playing. ; If not, schedule another event. if (ktrigger == 0) goto contin ; kscoreop="i", an i-statement. ; kinsnum="low_note", instrument named "low_note". ; kwhen=1, start at 1 second. ; kdur=0.5, play for a half-second. event "i", "low_note", 1, 0.5
; Make sure the event isn't triggered again. ktrigger = 0
contin: a1 oscils 10000, 440, 1 out a1 endin
; Instrument "low_note" - an oscillator with a low note. instr low_note a1 oscils 10000, 220, 1 out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Make sure the score plays for two seconds. f 0 2
; Play Instrument #1 for a half-second. i 1 0 0.5 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
